ModulePrefs.title: Include gadget (iframe)
ModulePrefs.description: Include another web page in your Google Site
ModulePrefs.author: Scott Johnston

Module.Content:
<style>
.loading-use-flexbox{
	display:flex;
	align-items:center;
	justify-content:center;
	width:100%;
	height:300px;
}
.loadingImg{
	height:300px;
	width:300px;
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	background-image:url('data:image/gif;base64,');
}
</style>

<div id='dest'>
	<span class="loading-use-flexbox"><div class="loadingImg"></div></span>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(doRender);
	var height = 800;
	function doRender(){ // setup variables 
		var prefs = new _IG_Prefs();
		var iframeURL = prefs.getString('iframeURL');
		var scroll = prefs.getString('scroll');
		var width = 600;
		if(gadgets.window){
			var viewport = gadgets.window.getViewportDimensions();
			if(viewport.width){
				var width = viewport.width;
			}
			if(viewport.height){
				var height = viewport.height;
			}
		} 
		var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
		iframe.setAttribute('width',width+'px');
		iframe.setAttribute('height',0+'px');
		iframe.setAttribute('onload','loaded(this)');
		
		// TODO: add options to control frameborder 
		iframe.setAttribute('frameborder','no');
		if(scroll){
			iframe.setAttribute('scrolling',scroll);
		}
		iframe.setAttribute('src',iframeURL);
		// set the slideshow to the placeholder div 
		var dest = document.getElementById('dest');
		dest.appendChild(iframe); 
	}
	
	function loaded(iframe){
		iframe.setAttribute('height',height+'px');
		var dest = document.getElementById('dest');
		dest.innerHTML = '';
	}
</script>
